note: Marxist-Leninist-Maoist | 25 | Bengali | Anti-fascist | Anti-imperialist | Pro-Dalit | Pro-Adivasi | Atheist | Amateur poet | Loves philosophy and sensuality.

name: Politics:
value: Marxism-Leninism-Maoism, Pro-Dalit, Pro-Adivasi, Pro-LGBTQIA+, Anti-caste, Free Kashmir, Free Palestine, Long Live the People's Wars in India, Philippines, Turkey and Peru!

name: Hobbies:
value: Reading, composing and writing poetry on politics, personal thoughts and erotica, debating and seeking the truth.
